member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION
member.summary: Specifies how to access a resource used in a depth-stencil view.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN is not a valid value for and is not used.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 1D texture.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 1D textures.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture with multisampling.

member.name: D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures with multisampling.
